text:
When I try the examples that come with tomcat with the apache connector they
never seem to get "post" data.  I looked at the code, and the read method in
WarpInputStream always returns -1.  I am assuming the problem was it just
wasn't implemented yet, it appears you are working on beta 4 now and it hasn't
been implemented.  Just wanted to make sure you were aware of the problem.
creator: fred@stsci.edu

text: Correct. I'll make the changes in the jakarta-tomcat-connectors CVS tree.
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
The bug has been fixed in CVS as of Wed Jul 25 23:35:46 BST 2001.
Please test wether it works for you or not.
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
I was unable to verify the fix due to compatibility problems between the
connector and the current version of tomcat in CVS:

Compiling Java sources with
CLASSPATH=/hoth/p2/net/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/dist/server/lib/catalina.jar:/hoth/p2/net/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/dist/common/lib/servlet.jar...
WarpRequest.java:129: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_DATA  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            this.packet.setType(Constants.TYPE_CBK_DATA);
                                         ^
WarpRequest.java:136: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_DONE  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            if (packet.getType()==Constants.TYPE_CBK_DONE) return(-1);
                                           ^
WarpRequest.java:138: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_DATA  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            if (packet.getType()!=Constants.TYPE_CBK_DATA)
                                           ^
WarpRequest.java:145: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_READ  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            this.packet.setType(Constants.TYPE_CBK_READ);
                                         ^
WarpRequest.java:158: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_DONE  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            this.packet.setType(Constants.TYPE_CBK_DONE);
                                         ^
WarpRequest.java:164: cannot resolve symbol
symbol  : variable TYPE_CBK_DATA  
location: class org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.Constants
            this.packet.setType(Constants.TYPE_CBK_DATA);
                                         ^

Also webapp/README.txt has a bug in the classpath example:

          # CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$CATALINA_HOME/common/lib/server.jar
Should be:
          # CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$CATALINA_HOME/common/lib/servlet.jar
creator: fred@stsci.edu

text:
Bot fixed in CVS as of Thu Jul 26 16:43:01 BST 2001.
When finding new problems with a closed bug, instead of commenting on 
the same bug, please open another one.
Thank you
creator: pier@betaversion.org
